title: Vaishnavi Emerald & Diamond Floral Haaram - Unveiling Timeless Elegance
features: Intricate floral design with delicate diamond settings. Features a central pendant with a large cabochon emerald surrounded by a halo of brilliant diamonds. Delicate gold bead dangles add graceful movement. The necklace showcases a contemporary take on a traditional Haaram with its cascading floral motifs and vibrant emerald accents.
occasions: and special occasions like anniversaries or milestone celebrations. Makes a statement piece for grand parties and cultural events.
description: A unique blend of tradition and modern design. The stunning combination of emeralds and diamonds exudes luxury and sophistication. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this piece embodies exceptional quality and attention to detail. The floral design symbolizes beauty, prosperity, and new beginnings, making it a meaningful gift.
